parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the security rule set.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The security rule set ID. You can call the [ListStandardGroups](~~465940~~) operation to obtain the ID of the security rule set.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the security rule set.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The tenant ID.

>  To view the tenant ID, go to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
